item.description:
This is a model shooting event. Bring your cameras and portrait lenses. We set up the large studio lights and provide the models for you to shoot. The space is large and can hold about 20 without being too crowded. We'll set up several backdrops so that you'll be shooting in small groups and rotating around.

A panoramic photo of the studio is here, http://www.facebook.c...


Pizza and drinks are also served around 6:15 so come early to eat.

Be sure to bring your model releases.

VERY IMPORTANT: You do need to email three images to the models. Don't assume that someone else will send their photos. Models need all kinds of images and looks.

Models who have indicated they are coming are:

Annie, http://www.modelmayhe...
Priya, http://www.myspace.co..., http://www.modelmayhe...
Maya, http://www.modelmayhe...
Patty, http://www.modelmayhe...
Sara, cannot make it now and has withdrawn.
Naz, http://www.modelmayhe...
Jonathan, http://carltonsoohoo....

I'll modify this list as they update their status.

Call Carlton if you have questions - area code 781, seven three eight, 3024
Or email carlton through this meetup.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be downstairs in the studio. The studio is among the other stores in the outdoor shopping plaza.
item.name: Models Shoot Out (6 models)
